event.title: Good Morning Quotes | Happy Good morning Quotes
event.description:
There is always a tomorrow and life gives us another opportunity to make things right, but if I’m wrong and today is all we have left, I would like to tell you how much I love you, I will never forget you.

Gabriel García Márquez
2302

The good times of today are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.

Bob Marley
884

It depends on you and me that between the two remains last night, this morning.

Joaquin Sabina
258

Is lost in your eyes and find a home, is you by my side every morning to wake up, see the rain wrapped in your arms in the hope of being loved.

Soraya
twenty

Thank you Lord for every morning waking up each food every day I do not ask my God for anything that you know my needs .. Thank you for your mercy oh GOD ……… & # 9829; & # 9 …

Denny Rafael Polanco Damas
472

Love is not the subject of a short time, is the day, morning and night and wake up thinking about what to do true love, God tests us every moment you choose with heart and blood, if n .. .

Aibarreto
25

THE MOST BEAUTIFUL OF EACH MORNING IS YOUR WAKE and contemplate shining face full of tenderness and love that seeing me in your eyes I feel like the happiest and blessed WOMAN BY GOD HAVE YOU …

Geidy TORRES
24

You are a beautiful flower with the scent of your voice you glad my awakening in the morning

ALONSO
37

Lord take me with you start life in middle of the night I wake another morning, I do not want to live without being amadaa

yeesiicaa
twenty

You have to have a dream and you can wake up in the morning.

Billy Wilder
10

The moon, snow, and now through the mist, the morning light !.

Oku Michihiko
3

Unhappy he who sleeps in the morning.

Hesiod
4

Which rises tomorrow, in his work forward.

Saying
27

It happened yesterday and tomorrow is still uncertain.

Tagami Kikusha
9

One morning I woke up and killed an elephant in my pajamas. I wonder how could put my pajamas ?.

Groucho Marx
7

Tomorrow is just an adverb of time.

Joan Manuel Serrat
5

Yesterday you were, now you tomorrow … maybe you’re not who you were.

Jaime Valenzuela Tenorio
51

Do not think of a great tomorrow if you let the small present.

Angel Lorenzo Salvatierra
30

There is one place where past and present meet and recognize and embrace. There is tomorrow.

Eduardo Galeano
271

Today I cry of pain but tomorrow laugh of happiness.

LEONARDO GONZALEZ
158

And never ceased to call, or send messages you send voice e n writings, but with the heart.

wake
13

You’re not with me but as I see with my eyes closed or open, there is darkness or calaridad.

wake
13

In my palm I have give you that I was born in my mind when I met and my heart when I fall in love with you

I draw the heart is love I acia you, before finishing it I put my hand up and enpieca throbbing feel like it’s real.

In my palm I have you know that I was born in my mind when I met and my heart when I fall in love with you.
